pages.text: This is a pigeon. These are often seen flying around, and are known for reacting too fast to be caught!

pages.title: About the Pigeon
pages.text: Pigeons can be found in biomes such as forests and plains. $(br2)Pigeons tend to stay in the air flying around, but they can be seen on ground every now and then. Pigeons can react really fast, so catching one will take a lot of practice and experience. $(br2)Pigeons are a very nutritive prey. But it will take a lot of experience to consistently hunt these.$(br)
